3: Run—!
Corrupted! Corrupted inside the factory—
Stop crying! Stop making noise!
You got in the lift already, so stuff it!
But, there are still so many who...
Never mind the others, just be glad you're still alive.
What's that sound?
It's Corrupted! The pulling device is stuck by Corrupted!
Bwah—!
If this continues! We'll all fall down to the bottom!
My little sister! My little sister's caught!
Sister, please! Help my little sister!
Please...
The sister shakes off the clinging boy.
Then walks up to the front, stomps at the Corrupted, and kicks it off the lift.
Big brother—
Don't worry, the old crone'll protect us...
Don't be so optimistic, kid. From now on, only you can protect your sister.
What?
The sister removes her hood and tears off a corner of her hampering dress, showing mechanical circuitry beneath her skin.
A pair of bladed wings spread out of her back. She leaps and dives into the Corrupted-filled abyss down below.
